statements: SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_name, status FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status, location FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, status FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Inactive');
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE location = 'Bedroom' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM device_statuses ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND status = 'inactive' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocation WHERE location_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, last_updated FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status_code = 200 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT room_name FROM Room WHERE room_type = 'Bedroom';
SELECT device_id, location_name, last_updated FROM DeviceLocation ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_type FROM Room WHERE room_type <> 'Kitchen';
SELECT device_id, location_name, last_updated FROM DeviceLocation WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, status_message FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status_code = 200 ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM Room WHERE room_type = 'office' AND room_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, status_code, last_updated FROM DeviceStatus WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND status_code IN (200, 404) ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_type FROM Room WHERE room_type IN ('bedroom', 'kitchen') ORDER BY room_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = true;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM rooms ORDER BY floor_number DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, status FROM device_status_history WHERE device_id = 'abc123';
SELECT type_name FROM device_types WHERE type_id IN ('123', '456', '789');
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT room_name, area, floor_number FROM rooms ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT type_name FROM device_types WHERE type_id IN (SELECT type_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location='Kitchen');
SELECT room_name, area, floor_number FROM rooms WHERE area > 50 AND floor_number = 2;
SELECT device_id, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM device_status_history WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01') ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT * FROM Device ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, type, status FROM TemperatureSensor WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT name, is_on FROM LightSwitch WHERE is_on = TRUE;
SELECT id, resolution, is_recording FROM Camera WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT id, name, address, city, country FROM Location ORDER BY country, city;
SELECT id, name, city FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Device WHERE type = 'Thermostat' AND status = 'Active';
SELECT name, temperature FROM TemperatureSensor WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, name, is_on FROM LightSwitch WHERE is_on = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, resolution FROM Camera WHERE is_recording = TRUE;
